_header: In summer when flowers will smell
_description: An Advanture on Wednesday, a Middle Scots pastourelle — eleven 6-line stanzas (aaabab)

Banna.First Lines:
In somer quhen flouris will smellAs I fure ouir feildis and
                    fell…
Banna.Last Lines: …This aventur anis to me comeOn Weddinsday
